trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The waiting pixie is sick and tired of waiting.
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the seeking pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_01<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “Beaver” to let the hiding pixie know that the game is up.
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_02<tab>Report to the seeking pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_TODO_03<tab>Report to the waiting pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_001<tab>Grrr, I am so angry right now! My friends promised that we'd play together here, but not one of them have come!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_002<tab>Instead they're over in Anden's Airs, playing hide-and-seek! That's the only game they ever play, hmph!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_003<tab>I want you to march over there and give them a good scolding for me! You're respected in our village, so they'll take your words to heart!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_004<tab>The others are over in Anden's Airs, playing hide-and-seek! Go over there and give them a good scolding for me!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_010<tab>...A promise? I don't recall a─ Ahhh! We completely forgot! Oh, we're so sorry!

TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_011<tab>We would go with you right now, but we're in the midst of a game of hide-and-seek. One of us is still hiding, and we can't well leave them behind. Will you help us search?
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_012<tab>Thank you! Now, when you find them, you must say the word “beaver.” It's the rules!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_013<tab>Right, let's get to it!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_014<tab>Our last hiding friend should be somewhere nearby. Remember, when you find them, you must say the word “beaver.” It's the rules!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>Beaver

TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_SYSTEM_100_021<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “Beaver” to let the hiding pixie know that the game is up.
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_100_022<tab>(Shhh! Can't you see I'm trying to hide!?)

TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_000_020<tab>Oh no, I am found! ...Wait, aren't you <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!? I didn't know you were playing too! This makes it even more fun, tee hee!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_BIBAPIXIE03426_100_030<tab>Tee hee, it was so fun being found by you! You must play hide-and-seek with us again!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_030<tab>You did well to find our hiding friend! We would never have thought to look there!
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_KAKUREPIXIE03426_000_031<tab>But come, it wouldn't do to keep our waiting friend waiting any longer. They aren't the most patient of pixies.
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_040<tab>The others finally came, thanks to you! But what's this I hear about you playing hide-and-seek with them?
TEXT_LUCKZD019_03426_WAITINGPIXIE03426_000_041<tab>That's not fair! I want to be found by you too! Promise me you'll play with us again soon!
